import React from 'react'; import { useParams } from 'react-router'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import Rating from '../components/Rating' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' export default function ProductScreen() { const params =useParams() const productList = useSelector(state => state.productList) const { products, loading, error } = productList; const product = products.find((x) => x._id === params.id); if(!product) { return
